description: This file defines a React functional component named Sidebar that displays a list of categories as clickable items, allowing users to filter notes by category. It utilizes JSX for rendering and exports the component as the default export.

methods.name: Sidebar({ categories, selected, onSelect, accentColor })
methods.description: React functional component that renders a sidebar with category items, highlighting the selected category and handling user clicks to change selection.

ctags.name: Sidebar
ctags.pattern: /^export default function Sidebar({ categories, selected, onSelect, accentColor }) {$/
